body.description: 5 Star Customer Support 7 days a week Powerful and Discreet Tracking This tracker is very small, discreet and accurate. It is made to be as small as possible without compromising the power of the tracker. Only 3.11 inches tall and 1.5 inches thick giving our customers the ability to hide this tracker in the smallest of locations. The Waterproof Twin Magnetic Case is also very small and has two of the strongest magnets on the market. Smartphone, Tablet or Desktop No matter your preference, you can track your vehicle from any Smartphone, Tablet or Desktop. We make all of our features super simple and straight forward to use. If you ever need technical help, you have a direct line to our professional in-house customer support team 7 days a week. Consistent updates – We keep it simple This GPS Tracker will work in the USA. The default settings is set for the tracker to report every 1 minute, but customers can change that setting free of charge to reporting every 10 seconds, 30 seconds, 2 minutes, 3 minutes, or 10 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Optimus 3.0 GPS Tracker with Heavy Duty Waterproof Case The Optimus 3.0 GPS Tracker enables you to keep an eye on the people and possessions that mean the most to you. - Watch the route of a loved one’s vehicle to make sure they safely arrive at their destination. - Ensure where your company car is, even if you are miles and miles away. - Have peace of mind and confidence that you will be able to quickly locate an expensive stolen asset. Strongest Magnets Around Our Magnetic case has Neodymium magnets that are the strongest type of permanent magnet commercially available. And we added two on our magnetic GPS tracker case! Protects your investment with watertight and water-resistant construction . Waterproof Twin Magnetic Case Simply place your tracker inside the case and attach it securely under a car, truck, machinery or any asset with a flat metal surface. Low Cost Subscription plan! This tracker has a very low subscription plan! Don't get stuck into long term contracts with high fees offered by others. With us, you will have no contract, no activation fees, no cancellation fees, no hidden fees, and affordable subscription plan options as low as only $15.95 per month!

Tracking Features Attached and Track The Waterproof Magnetic Case for the Optimus 3.0 can be easily hidden underneath a car or on any secure metal surface. You can have your tracker hidden and ready to use within minutes. We are trusted by thousands of customers every day. Position Report Frequency Customizable frequency reports at your disposal. You have the control to change how often your GPS tracker reports at any time. The less frequent reporting will allow your tracker’s battery to last longer while the more frequent reporting will make the trail more detailed. Speed Alerts When your tracker is on the road, our software collects data with real-time speed limit tracking. You can set alerts to notify you when and where the tracker went over the speed limit and at what speed. Driving history reports will show a record of the trip and how often the tracker went over the speed limit or a pre-defined maximum speed you set for the tracker. Geofence Alerts When the tracker leaves or enters a pre-defined area Set your customized areas on a map to know when the vehicle enters or leaves that pre-defined area. Our Geofence mapping uses state-of-the-art technology so you can draw any shape on the map to get pinpoint accuracy on your Geofence alerts. We use the most advanced and reliable Google Maps for our App and web browser.

Powerful App You will love our App. It is simple and reliable. Our GPS Tracking App is super easy to use. It is straight forward and no nonsense. We include all of the features in our low-cost monthly subscription. There are no confusing add-ons or levels to choose from. Customize your alerts and notifications Create Alerts, Geofences (when the tracker leaves or enters a pre-defined area) and Driving Reports all from within the App itself. Available for IPhone and Android Phones. Instant Alerts Enjoy the peace of mind that you will be notified when an event occurs. Our App and website will allow you to get Push Notifications, Text Messages and/or Emails. At your fingertips in Real Time Place your tracker inside of the Waterproof Magnetic Case and secure the latch. We recommend placing the case on a secure metal surface underneath the vehicle or asset. We made sure to use the best magnets on the market so you can have the confidence and peace of mind that your device will be safe and secure. Small and Powerful This tracker may be small in size, but it has more power than meet the eye. It will detect movement, speed, direction, location, and more all in real-time. It is only 3.11 x 1.5 x 1.75 inches so you will be able to hide it or travel with it conveniently and confidently.

5 Star Customer Support 7 days a week Powerful and Discreet Tracking This tracker is very small, discreet and accurate. It is made to be as small as possible without compromising the power of the tracker. Only 3.11 inches tall and 1.5 inches thick giving our customers the ability to hide this tracker in the smallest of locations. The Waterproof Twin Magnetic Case is also very small and has two of the strongest magnets on the market. Smartphone, Tablet or Desktop No matter your preference, you can track your vehicle from any Smartphone, Tablet or Desktop. We make all of our features super simple and straight forward to use. If you ever need technical help, you have a direct line to our professional in-house customer support team 7 days a week. Consistent updates – We keep it simple This GPS Tracker will work in the USA. The default settings is set for the tracker to report every 1 minute, but customers can change that setting free of charge to reporting every 10 seconds, 30 seconds, 2 minutes, 3 minutes, or 10 minutes. We keep it simple! Real-Time Tracking on App and Website. Get Notifications on your Cellphone, SMS, Email. Coverage Limited to the USA. Low cost subscription plan is required for use. Text, Email and Push Notifications

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product for my personal car . I have two new teenage drivers in my home , & when they use my car I’m able to track their whereabouts . Also I set up a geofence around the perimeter of my block , so that it alerts me when my car leaves my block ,,also when I’m at work I can see if they are using my car . Works great !!Simple to use ! Very accurate !! Battery last s long time . I charged it 5 days ago it’s still n my car since and battery is at 97%. Great product , @ a great price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best quality overall of any tracking device and its category great battery life
reviews.reviewText: Durability: comes with very very powerful magnetic case that keeps it safe.Battery Life: much better than previous versionEase of use: download the app, paid for your monthly subscription, and I have a GPS tracker on my phone.Accuracy: this is very accurate, being able to be checked up to 5 - 10 seconds of perfectionPrice: none of these are as cheap as they should be with servcie.... He takes $20 a month for GPS only. You can get any smartphone, with a prepaid provider for $25 a month and get internet voice, data, and text. The fact that they are just using a SIM card for GPS makes $20 per month steepVersus the competition: I have always used to Tracki and I think this is a similar price with the subscription and advice, with very similar accuracy, destiny different platform and interface. It also has better battery lifeThe prior version of Optimus is the best price for what you get, but the battery life is less and tracki he has more options. I simply looking for accuracy and price, not battery life, you don't this new version. However, has a one-time purchase I don't see why you wouldn't catch the one with the best battery life since tracking often poses a challenge when it comes to keeping it charged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product works well. Gives you updates if you set the settings. Very reasonable monthly rates without a contract. I canceled before my month was up without any issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great tracker for the price!
reviews.reviewText: For$39 it works great, plus $19 a month for subscription. My only issue is the accuracy is not perfect. It can be off by a few hundred feet when sitting. Signal is obviously bouncing. However when moving on the street it seems pretty close to correct. I suggest the 10 second update when tracking a moving object/ person. This gives the best route history and actual cornering. Otherwise it cuts off the corners due to lack of updates. Overall I’m very impressed. Comes with a nice weather proof magnetic case for attaching to a metal object (car). Battery life seems good so far. Mine has been on for a week and still shows 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product for tracking, guick updates, only wish the start movement was faster to update. I noticed a 1 minute lag time from when the tracker starts moving to when I get an alert. Great battery life. Solid build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great battery life
reviews.reviewText: It’s been on the car for 2 weeks and battery is at 68%, the magnet is strong and holds very well if you attach it to metal. I suspect those reviews that say it fell off because they didn’t attach it correctly. The accuracy is a bit off because I get notice of movements like 5-10 mins after the car started the trip but I guess it’s when it receives the gps signal depending on the area. Overall it’s a great product for $30. I will buy another just to swap it out at the same time when I have charge it but for now it should last well over a month at this rate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for cost of tracker. App is easy to navigate. You can swap ping times from10, 3, 2 & 1 minutes on the fly from the app. Cost of service is $20 per month no contracts. So far I’m very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Battery life not as described. Only lasted 4 days! Tracking is off, and its freezes in one area even when vechical is moving. Very disappointed
It is not accurate enough and the battery last no more than a week
